Package com.larkwoodlabs.net.udp

Provides interfaces and classes used to send and receive UDP datagrams.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MulticastEndpoint Interface exposed by objects that forward multicast datagrams as requested using the join and leave methods.
UdpEndpoint A DuplexChannel used to send and receive UdpDatagram objects.
 

Class Summary
UdpDatagram A representation of a UDP datagram.
UdpDatagramPayloadSource A MessageSource that receives UDP packets via a UdpEndpoint and sends the datagram payload to an OutputChannel.
UdpDatagramSource A MessageSource that receives UDP datagrams via a UdpEndpoint and sends the datagram to an OutputChannel.
UdpInputChannel An InputChannel that can be used to receive UdpDatagram instances from a UdpEndpoint.
UdpOutputChannel An OutputChannel that can be used to send UdpDatagram instances to a UdpEndpoint.
UdpPacketOutputChannel An OutputChannel that can be used to send a byte array containing an RTP/RTCP packet to a specific address and port via UDP.
UdpSocketEndpoint A UdpEndpoint implementation that uses a DatagramChannel to provide transport.
 

Package com.larkwoodlabs.net.udp Description

Provides interfaces and classes used to send and receive UDP datagrams.
